if you like half life and love portal then this might be you're thing. Plus the build you're own test chamber editor is great! Would highly recomend to future game devs to get in some harmless practice. The easy drag and drop Mario maker style method is great for people who like simple,sweet.short and to the point level creation that gives portal fans an fan made squeal.
Portal is amazing.  Portal 2 is even...amazing-er.  Play both.  Enjoy.
gud game

Portal 2 is one of the greatest games of all time. The writing is absolutely top of its class and there are stories of writers of other games scripts thinking they could never make something that good in their entire life. The story itself if far better than the first game and goes places with the setting and the characters, old and new, that the first game couldn't. The gameplay has gotten even better than expected in so many ways. The new mechanics and objects that the levels have to play with bring the level of diversity in levels to a new level. This is undeniably one of Valves best games and one of the best games of all time. If you haven't played Portal 1, get it and play both in order, if you've played the first game, play this game now. Portal 2 is a masterpiece.

A great game to play co-op with someone. It really makes you work together and use your brains to get through each level. Once you complete the game there's a ton of community maps that you can do that pushes the complexity even further! Loads of fun and well worth the money.

Hace que portal sea la tía abuela senil de la familia... y portal es un excelente juego, así de bueno es! Mejores puzzles, más complicados pero eso hace que sea entretenido. Más elementos en el juego y muchos más logros por desbloquear, por lo que incluso cuando terminás el juego, te sigue quedando bastante por explorar aún. Mi característica favorita, debo decir, es el humor... Portal 2 nos prueba que las secuelas no siempre son malas <3

10/10
absolute classic

Portal 2, for me, feels like a realization of the first game's concepts. I enjoyed the first Portal immensely, I want to make sure I say that right away. My biggest issue with the game is that it was incredibly short, and it felt like it didn't do enough with the concepts it had in place. 

Portal 2, however, fixes that perfectly. It explores the concepts of the first perfectly, and makes the world feel even bigger and more alive. The game feels much less cramped than the first, all while never quite leaving the "laboratory" setting. 

I find myself desperately wanting a Portal 3, but I have no real idea where they'd go with it aside from exploring Chell's story more. But as that would take her outside of the confines of Aperture, I doubt that they'd do that. Still, I enjoyed both Portal games immensely, even without a 3rd to round them out.

"Cave Johnson here...  Wait?  There are other games?  Like American Truck Simulator?  Well, park that truck and come back to good ol' Aperture.  Come walk though these hallowed halls of SCIENCE.  Portal your way through those old familiar tests you know so well.  Come Quaratine with us here at Aperture.  That [spoiler]flourescent coffee[/spoiler] will cure that pesky little Rona virus.  Ha!  Named it after one of the girls in the front lobby.  Anyway,   Get back down here and do some science."

A really good ggame and worthy sequel of the beloved original Portal that was showed and released on 2007, along side Team Fortress 2 and Half-Life 2: Episode 1.

Fun and challenging puzzles, new mechanics like the light bridges, the lazers or all the gels, the new cores, such as the Space Core or Wheatley, and the plot revelations such as the past of GLaDOS, Cave Jhonson, the old Apperture, and the many references of the things that happened to the world outside of the test chambers, with the events of Half-Life taking event while Chell is trapped down there, a really fun game or experience and I'd recomend to play it if you liked the first Portal, like a good narrative or love puzzle games.

yılları önce bundle olarak alıp, ilk oyunu oynadıktan sonra tekrara düşeceğini düşünerek ikinci oyuna devam etmemiştim. amazing fun and a great story

Both this and Portal are worth playing if you like puzzle games. Some puzzles are easy, some are really well thought out and some will have you scratching your head. There are also user submitted chambers that are a lot of fun to play too. Story line works and for the price you cant go wrong.
